name: Aggregate
description: Aggregation of one or more nested errors surfaced by a result pipeline.

name: Canceled
description: Operation canceled by a linked token or cancellation-aware pipeline.

name: ChannelCompleted
description: Channel completed before a pending operation could finish.

name: DeterministicReplay
description: Deterministic gate replay attempted to re-execute a captured side effect.

name: Exception
description: Unhandled exception surfaced by a result pipeline.

name: SelectDrained
description: All channel cases completed without yielding a value while selecting.

name: TaskQueueAbandoned
description: Task queue operation abandoned after exceeding the retry policy.

name: TaskQueueDeadLettered
description: Task queue work item moved to the dead-letter handler.

name: TaskQueueDisposed
description: Task queue operations attempted after disposal.

name: TaskQueueLeaseExpired
description: Lease expired without being completed or extended.

name: TaskQueueLeaseInactive
description: Lease is no longer active and cannot be manipulated.

name: Unspecified
description: Fallback error used when the failure category is unknown.

name: Validation
description: Input validation failed or precondition was not satisfied.

name: VersionConflict
description: Deterministic workflow attempted to execute an unsupported version.
